title: Inventories
content:

Inventories

 

 

  • Inventories
    • Field Description
    • Action Buttons

Manhattan Enterprise Inventory provides retailers with a complete and real-time view of perpetual inventory across every fulfillment location in the enterprise including: stores, in-transit, on-order and third-party owned/fulfilled inventory. Using open APIs to synchronize inventory positions across a retailer’s network and external applications in real time, Manhattan Enterprise Inventory delivers the global view of inventory – a retailer needs to power-omni-channel commerce.

The Inventories supply UI enables you to view supply details of an organization. This screen will display the supplies for both DC and Stores.

This  is a read-only screen. The Filter Panel on the Inventories page helps you to set up the filter condition to drill down to specific information.

 

Filters: You can use the following Inventories filters:

  • Reserved Quanity
  • ETA
  • Item ID
  • Location ID
  • Quantity
  • Reference ID
  • Reference Type
  • Supply Type
  • Unit of Measure
Field Description

The field descriptions of inventory attributes:

 

Field

Description
Reserved Quanity The reserved quantity of the inventory supply.
ETA The estimated time of arrival of the inventory supply. This is a date field.
Item Id  The Item identifier.
Location Id The location identifier.
Quanity The inventory supply quantity.
Refference ID The reference identifier for the inventory supply.
Refference Type The reference type for the inventory supply.
Supply Type The supply type for the inventory supply.
Unit of Measure The unit of measure for inventory supply.

 

 

Action Buttons

The following action buttons are available on the page:

 

Field

 

 Description

 
Select All Rows Select all the rows of records on the screen.
Related Links

Click Related Links and select View Items to navigate to the Items screen. 
Export Click to export the list of inventory supply attributes. The file gets downloaded to your system. See Export for more information.
